metadata.title: CVE-2023-1989 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in btsdio_remove indrivers\bluetooth\btsdio.c in the Linux Kernel. In this flaw, a call tobtsdio_remove with an unfinished job, may cause a race problem leading to aUAF on hdev devices.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
